data.name: Smile For Me - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Features:

  • Soundtrack composed by Lucas Saur, and performed with live instruments
  • 14 original tracks featured in Smile For Me
  • 4 bonus tracks, not available in-game!
data.about_the_game:
Features:

  • Soundtrack composed by Lucas Saur, and performed with live instruments
  • 14 original tracks featured in Smile For Me
  • 4 bonus tracks, not available in-game!
data.short_description: May your ear-holes rejoice. It’s the esoteric music-scape of Smile For Me, now available on home-DLC. Composedby Lucas Saur and recorded with live instruments, these tunes are sure to put a pep in your step!
data.legal_notice:

all rights reserved.
